data.text: @Foodie_Kathleen Hi, Kathleen. We're sorry for the delay this has taken. We've tried sending you a DM but your settings do not allow us to do so. Kindly adjust your settings on Twitter so we can send you a direct message. Thank you.

@lewor_lacson However, please note that entry restrictions and requirements are constantly evolving. Thus, we highly suggest to check this with the concerned travel authority in your origin and destination as well. 

(2/2)

urls.title: Travel during COVID
urls.description: Travel requirements are subject to change at short notice by the issuing government authority. As such, posting of the advisories below is not real-time and serve only as a guide. Please confirm your requirements directly with the offices/websites of your place of origin and destination. All passengers are encouraged to follow the guide, register in advance and pre-book their hotels as necessary to avoid any inconvenience and experience faster processing upon arrival. Per PAL’s Conditions of Carriage,

(1) Clear your browsing history, cache, and cookies
(2) Use a different browser or device

Let us know if this works. Thank you.

@annakarrenina Name correction is under the assessment of our Reservations agents, Annakarrenina. We have sent you a DM so we can look into your concern further. Thank you.

@annakarrenina Hi, Anna. The name in the ticket and passport/valid ID must be exactly matched. Name correction will be subject to further assessment. Please note that this will depend on existing policies considering the fare rules and ticket restrictions of your reservation. Thank you.

@KSA8964 Hi, O. We apologize for the inconvenience. We are unable to send you a DM due to your account settings. Please adjust your settings so we could send you a DM and assist you further. Thank you.

@FrancaLalic All information shared in the One Health Pass is collected and processed solely by the Bureau of Quarantine (BOQ). The One Health Pass website is independent of PAL and PAL has no control over their website.

urls.title: BOQ Health Declaration Registration
urls.description: REMINDER! The accuracy of the information and personal data you fill in through this portal is your sole responsibility. By continuing to register, you confirm that you understand that the information provided on the registration form is true, complete, and correct. BOQ shall not be liable for any claims, damages or liability arising from any incorrect or incomplete information provided. IMPORTANT NOTICE! For Foreign/Filipino (18 years old and above), FULLY vaccinated travelers WITHOUT BOOSTER are

data.text:

urls.title: Prepaid baggage
urls.description: No need to worry about your travel essentials! Save more versus excess fees at the airport. Check-in smoothly at the airport. Rates are per sector and vary per destination. Please refer to the rates and guidelines below. PH – Hong Kong or v.v. USD 45 PH – Port Moresby or v.v. USD 65 PH – Sydney/Melbourne or v.v. USD 95 PH – Tel Aviv or v.v. USD 165 PH – Singapore or v.v. USD 45 PH – Phnom Penh or v.v. USD 45 PH – Hong Kong or v.v. HKD 380 PH – Shanghai or v.v. CNY 320 PH – Denpasar or v.v. IDR 630000 PH

data.text: @KlarenPilola Prepaid Baggage can be availed to check-in more than your Free Baggage Allowance indicated in your ticket. You may check this link for more information including applicable service rules: https://t.co/JD7gy4oMAg. Thank you.
